Odyssey Sensors | Full Stack Developer (Front-End 75% / Back-End 25% ) | Full-Time contract position | ONSITE | Sydney, Australia

Odyssey Sensors is an innovative and dynamic company that is focused on designing and delivering affordable, reliable and simple-to-use hardware for optimizing water management on Australian farms. Utilizing LoRa, Odyssey Sensors is well placed to capitalize on the significant opportunities that exist for farmers to employ the Internet of Things on their properties in Australia.

If you are passionate about ag-tech, enjoy tinkering, want flexibility, and are excited by the opportunity to spend time on Australian farms then we want to hear from you.

You will work closely with product engineers in the US and have significant responsibility for leading front-end software development.

Requires high competence HTML, CSS and Javascript and working knowledge of of Java, Python, SQL database (postgres), NOSQL â€“ MongoDB and MQTT.

More information and details on how to apply here: http://odysseysensors.com/job-opportunities/full-stack-devel...
